name: Gunslinger (Billamu)
description:
1. You have 3 lives. Wait for the bandit to flinch.

2. Press Space to shoot the bandit. Faster reaction time means more points!

3. If he shoots you first, you lose a life and half your score. Bummer!

4. If you shoot before he does, that's a foul. You lose 9/10ths your score. Aaarghh! Don't shoot him first!

5. Write your score in the comments. Good luck, stranger!
